strings.evolution:
In the past, this is how
elves used to hone their skills.
In theory, these techniques are similar.
strings.affinity:
It doesn't matter if this body is temporary,
or even that our races are different...
Trust can still be born.
strings.description: A member of an elven tribe, strictly devoted to protecting their elven traditions. In love with nature, distrusting of other races, and devoted to protecting the law, he was in charge of governing one of the elven colonies scattered across the land. 700 years ago, one by one the elven colonies were blown away by the war of Paladia, and the miasma which followed took the lives of his wife Lunera as well as the rest of his brethren, leaving him alone.
strings.fusion:
I only wanted power so that
I could protect my brethren.
What is it you wish to protect?
strings.summon:
Can't I be allowed to sleep in peace?
It matters not, use me as you will.

strings.affinity:
It doesn't matter if this body is temporary,
or even that our races are different...
Trust can still be born.
strings.description: The head soldier of an elven tribe, especially talented in literary and military arts. Long ago, he lived in an underground castle in Gronoa where he was in charge of rounding up survivors from a tragedy which had befallen them. Though the typically strict, law-abiding and conservative elves disliked other races like humans and dwarves, it appears he had a sweet spot for their arts.
strings.fusion:
This reminds me of the power I once had.
The time...when I was a soldier.
strings.summon:
So the power hungry humans wish
to use even the emotions
hiding within me...

strings.evolution:
Magic that enhances one's power,
like a miracle straight from nature...
This is similar to elven techniques.
strings.affinity:
It doesn't matter if this body is temporary,
or even that our races are different...
Trust can still be born.
strings.description: Leader of the elves, a race that values law and tradition. Leaving in an underground castle in the land of Gronoa he was cut off from all other races, but through trading art with others and meeting with the dwarf Ruggles, his frozen heart began to thaw. Under the care of his friend Ruggles, it is said he was able to peacefully return to the nature he loved so much.
strings.fusion:
Even glorious power can produce
great tragedy in the hands of the foolish.
strings.summon:
It seems those who look past war are fated
to fight even after they have passed...
Or maybe this is a chance for atonement.
